author: sabpol
title: Basic pile of bricks
review:
I remember when my mom gave this set to me about 30 years ago.  I enjoyed playing with it at the time, although now it looks incredibly boring compared to modern-day sets of helicopters and cars.  But there was something re-assuring about putting together a set that you could memorize the build of after building it one time and having a completed set in a matter of seconds.

On the upside, the pieces to this set are so basic that you could easily duplicate this set using a bucket of assorted bricks or using pieces from other sets.
